document_data.name: Smoke Wyrm
document_data.mainbody: The '''Smoke Wyrm''' was a [[tavern]] in [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] run by the [[dwarf]] [[Tharzon Brewhammer]] and his son [[Kurzen Brewhammer]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|1323|5}} The tavern was best known for its excellent stout known as [[Old Smokey (ale)|Old Smokey]], which was shipped all over the [[Vast]].<ref>{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|2168}}
document_data.Structure: The tavern had a sign that depicted a sleeping [[dragon]] blowing smoke out of his nose.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|2528|8}}
